::DrillBit::

He turned to Cyber Claw.
"Hello. I hope we can make this Alliance work. I'm DrillBit."

::Hot Rod::

He reached the Alliance base. He turned to bot mode, and went to a CR.

::Demolition::

He just kept shooting at everything in site, that wasn't Alliance.
